revision.text: {{Talk header}} {{Article history |action1=GAN |action1date=12:09, 18 March 2013 |action1link=/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid= 545090858 |action2=WAR |action2date=06:33, 27 April 2013 (UTC) |action2link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Norman Schwarzkopf, Jr. |action2result=approved |action2oldid=552332752 |action3=FAC |action3date=10:07, 15 June 2013 |action3link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Norman Schwarzkopf, Jr./archive1 |action3result=not promoted |action3oldid=558454680 |currentstatus=GA |topic=warfare |itndate=28 December 2012 }} {{WikiProject banner shell|1= {{WikiProject Biography|living=n|class=GA|listas=Schwarzkopf, Norman, Jr.|military-task-force=yes|military-priority=high}} {{WikiProject Military history|class=A||A-Class=pass|Biography=y|US=y}} {{WikiProject Vietnam|class=GA|importance=low}} {{WikiProject United States|class=GA|importance=low}} {{WikiProject College football|class=GA|importance=low}}}} {{User:MiszaBot/config |archiveheader = {{talkarchivenav|noredlinks=y}} |maxarchivesize = 200K |counter = 2 |algo = old(180d) |archive = Talk:Norman Schwarzkopf, Jr./Archive %(counter)d }} {{Auto archiving notice|bot=MiszaBot I |age=6 |units=months }} == Date of birth == Which day was his birthday August 22nd or 24th because according to some sources they say he was born on the 24th while yours say 22nd. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/207.237.34.211|207.237.34.211]] ([[User talk:207.237.34.211|talk]]) 01:40, 28 December 2012 (UTC) :His autobiography says August 22. The August 24 dates are from an AP "onfile" obit, used by the Huffington Post and others. [[User:Tomsv 98|Tomsv 98]] ([[User talk:Tomsv 98|talk]]) 19:03, 28 December 2012 (UTC) missing is any reference to Critique of Desert Storm being a difficult campaign , typical wikipedia censorship [[Special:Contributions/75.163.205.209|75.163.205.209]] ([[User talk:75.163.205.209|talk]]) 08:19, 1 September 2015 (UTC) == [[Pneumonia]]: where did he get it? == seems many people get the disease at a hospital. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/75.84.95.229|75.84.95.229]] ([[User talk:75.84.95.229|talk]]) 07:31, 28 December 2012 (UTC) ==Media references== Disregarding the fact that the Media References section dissappeared when I tried to edit it, I wanted to add another one to it - the M5A2 ''Schawrzkopf'' main battle tank of the United States Joint Strike Force from [[Tom Clancy's Endwar|Endwar]]. - [[Special:Contributions/46.138.186.75|46.138.186.75]] ([[User talk:46.138.186.75|talk]]) 14:29, 28 December 2012 (UTC) == Persian Gulf War -> Gulf War == Someone changed some (not all) of the instances of "Gulf War" to "Persian Gulf War", despite the fact that our article on the subject is named "[[Gulf War]]". I changed this article to consistently use "Gulf War", and it was re-edited to change some (not all) back to "Persian Gulf War". Should we not use the name of the article in WP for consistency, particularly in this case because it's such a high-profile article? —[[[User:AlanM1|AlanM1]]([[User talk:AlanM1|talk]])]— 21:14, 2 January 2013 (UTC) :Its not really that important, per COMMON NAME it should be whatever the people know the conflict as, as the two (non military assigned) names most closely associated with it would be gulf war and persian gulf war. If you want it to be all one thing or all another you are welcome to edit the article to that end, just know that in the end the end it doesn't matter much. [[User:TomStar81|TomStar81]] ([[User talk:TomStar81|Talk]]) 05:09, 3 January 2013 (UTC) {{Talk:Norman Schwarzkopf, Jr./GA1}} == [[The luckiest man in Iraq]] == That article is now nominated for deletion. Would you consider it appropriate to include a sentence or two about that episode in this article? Regards, [[User:Iselilja|Iselilja]] ([[User talk:Iselilja|talk]]) 10:37, 25 August 2013 (UTC) == Name == I believe his autobiography states that his name was not Herbert. It was just the initial "H". — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/137.48.27.185|137.48.27.185]] ([[User talk:137.48.27.185|talk]]) 21:10, 26 May 2015 (UTC)
